title: High Alcohol Consumption Among Males
description: In 2020, Romanian males aged 15 and above consumed an average of 27.03 liters of pure alcohol per capita, one of the highest rates globally.

title: Significant Growth in Income for the Bottom 40%
description: In 2022, the bottom 40% of Romania's population experienced an 11.42% annualized growth in per capita real survey mean consumption or income, indicating significant economic progress.

title: Overall Economic Growth
description: Romania's total population saw an 8.85% annualized growth in per capita real survey mean consumption or income in 2022, reflecting a robust economic performance.

title: Moderate Arms Exports
description: In 2023, Romania's arms exports were valued at 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, indicating a moderate level of military trade activity.

title: High Alcohol Consumption Among Females
description: In 2020, Romanian females aged 15 and above consumed an average of 7.42 liters of pure alcohol per capita, reflecting a high consumption rate.

title: Overall High Alcohol Consumption
description: In 2020, the total alcohol consumption per capita in Romania was 16.8 liters, placing it among the highest globally.

title: Corruption Control Challenges
description: In 2023, Romania's control of corruption standard error was 0.1449, indicating challenges in effectively managing corruption.
